It also lets you export all the data to an Excel file, be it all the data or for a determinated period. experiences.title: Blog from Scratch with PHP
experiences.description:
I had the opportunity to work with a client who was in need of a custom-built blog using PHP. The client had a specific vision in mind for the blog and wanted it to be built from the ground up. I was responsible for developing the entire backend of the blog, including managing the database and logic using a MySQL database solution.
 To ensure that the blog was reliable and scalable, I deployed it in an AWS Beanstalk environment. This allowed for easy deployment and management of the application. 
 During the development process, I collaborated closely with the client to understand their requirements and make sure that the blog was meeting their expectations. I also implemented various features to enhance the user experience, such as a user authentication system and a commenting system. 
 Overall, this project was a great opportunity to refine my skills in PHP development and database management. It was a challenging but rewarding project that resulted in a functional and attractive blog that met the client's needs.

experiences.title: Ecommerce website built with JavaScript (Demo)
experiences.description:
As part of a demo project, I built an ecommerce website using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript. The website allows users to browse a variety of furniture products, add items to their cart, and complete the purchase process.
 While this project was a demo that I completed in a day, it allowed me to practice my skills in frontend development and UX design.
